title: Stunning SE Corner w/ Floor-Ceiling Windows! 2 On-Site Gyms! Dog Park!
map_address: 3801 Stone Way, North near N 38th Street
posting_body: Call for more info or to schedule a self-guided or virtual tour.
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 660 Sq.
Bowman is North Seattle's newest apartment community.
Bowman evokes inspired Stone Way living.
Kick off your shoes and take in the views!
Located right in Wallingford, where many of the city's most creative-minded restaurants and shops have made a home.
Easy on the eyes, and on the lifestyle.
Bowman homes are relaxed modern, with splashes of serene color that add an infusion of warmth.
Situated in Seattle's next destination district, Bowman is a sophisticated invitation to a chill lakeside vibe.
Call us to learn more information and select your favorite floorplan.

Floor to ceiling windows, Linen closets*, Chalk Board Accent Walls, Kitchens that make a statement, Wood-like plank flooring, Glossy kitchen cabinets in white or navy blue, Pantry cabinets in kitchens, Porcelain tile backsplashes, Carpet in bedrooms, Stainless, GE kitchen appliances, Custom pendant lighting*, Oversized windows and swing doors that open to the patio or balconies*, Plenty of storage, Expansive ceiling height in many homes, Carrera quartz countertops, Islands or peninsula counters, Open to the street or courtyard with your own private patios*, Juliette balconies or full decks avail

Foosball Table, Crossfit/TRX Room, Personalized package system, Courtyard, Wave G Internet access available, Greenhouse Lounge, Cardio Fitness Room, Dog Wash area, Expansive Lobby, Meeting Room, Gaming Lounge, Dog Run, Sports Lounge, Shuffleboard, Ping Pong, Media Room, Large rooftop deck
*Prices and Availability are subject to change.
Pet Friendly - Large Dogs Up to 80lbs
